titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31995F0401 English
95/401/JHA: Joint Action of 25 September 1995 adopted by the Council on the basis of Article K.3 of the Treaty on European Union, on measures implementing Article K.1 of the Treaty

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: 95/401/JHA: Joint Action of 25 September 1995 adopted by the Council on the basis of Article K.3 of the Treaty on European Union, on measures implementing Article K.1 of the Treaty
body.p: adopted by the Council on the basis of Article K.3 of the Treaty on European Union, on measures implementing Article K.1 of the Treaty
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article K.3 (2) (b) thereof,

For the purposes of achieving the objectives referred to in Article K.1 of the Treaty, the Union shall carry out measures relating to training, the gathering and exchange of information and experience, seminars, studies and publications, and also other operational measures in support of its cooperation activities.
Decisions on the financing of the measures described in Article 1 shall be taken in accordance with Article K.8 (2) of the Treaty.
This Joint Action shall enter into force on the day of its adoption.
